subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: St. Anthony High School of Jersey City has the No. 1-ranked boys basketball team in the country and six of its nine seniors have already signed to play for Division I teams.
snippet: St. Anthony High School of Jersey City has the No. 1-ranked boys basketball team in the country and six of its nine seniors have already signed to play for Division I teams.
